SelectItemInventory - Class in mig.view
SelectItemInventory is class that create a JDialog to let the player chose from its inventory an item that he wants to remove The items are given by the PNJs or found in the different rooms.
SelectItemInventory(JFrame, String, String, Game, Window) - Constructor for class mig.view.SelectItemInventory
Constructor for the Dialog component This component can be closed without close the principal Window
SelectItemRoom - Class in mig.view
SelectItemInventory is class that create a JDialog to add the inventory an item which which was found in a Room These items are found by the user in the differents rooms
SelectItemRoom(JFrame, String, String, Game, Window) - Constructor for class mig.view.SelectItemRoom
Constructor for the Dialog component This component can be closed without close the principal Window
selectNom - Variable in class mig.view.PrincipalWindow
selectNom is a JPanel : create the first window who asked the name of the player
SelectNPC - Class in mig.view
SelectNPC is class that create a JDialog to allow the player to select the NPC that the player wants to speak The PNCs are in the different rooms
SelectNPC(JFrame, String, String, Game, Window) - Constructor for class mig.view.SelectNPC
Constructor for the Dialog component This component can be closed without close the principal Window
